docs.title: GenIR Reading Group
docs.text:
欢迎来到我们的 Generative Information Retrieval 阅读笔记网站！

我们会在这里整理： - 按主题分类的 GenIR 论文 - 每篇论文的 Paper + Code 链接 - 简短的一句话总结 - Roadmap（方法之间的关系图）

后续我们会继续补充内容。

docs.title: Papers: Document Retrieval
docs.text: A curated collection of representative papers in Generative Document Retrieval, each with a short summary and tags.

docs.title: 1. GENRE (2020)
docs.text: 🔗 paper · code Summary: Early sequence-to-sequence retrieval model using entity generation as output space. Tags: seq2seq, entity-retrieval, early-GR

docs.title: 2. T5 for Retrieval (2021)
docs.text: 🔗 paper Summary: Shows that encoder–decoder language models can be fine-tuned to directly generate document identifiers. Tags: t5, generative-retrieval

docs.title: 3. ASI — Autoregressive Search Index (ICLR 2023)
docs.text: 🔗 paper Summary: Proposes hierarchical document ID generation using a multi-level indexing tree. Tags: hierarchical-id, indexing, id-structure

docs.title: 4. GR2 — Guided Decoding for Generative Retrieval (ICLR 2023)
docs.text: 🔗 paper Summary: Improves GR by adding constrained decoding and structural guidance. Tags: guided-decoding, constraint

docs.title: 5. SEATER (2023)
docs.text: 🔗 paper Summary: Decomposes GR errors and designs tree-structured IDs to reduce generation ambiguity. Tags: tree-id, error-analysis

docs.title: 6. BM25-Labeled GR Training (2023)
docs.text: 🔗 paper Summary: Uses BM25 pseudo labels to supervise GR training without relevance annotations. Tags: pseudo-label, weak-supervision

docs.title: 7. ReasonGR — Multi-Step Reasoning for GR (NeurIPS 2024)
docs.text: 🔗 paper Summary: Introduces multi-hop reasoning into document ID generation to improve retrieval for complex queries. Tags: reasoning, multihop

docs.title: 8. DCI — Discriminative Contrastive Indexing (SIGIR 2025)
docs.text: 🔗 paper (placeholder) Summary: Incorporates contrastive signals into docID learning to improve discriminability and semantic separation. Tags: contrastive, discriminative-id, indexing

docs.title: 9. NOVA — Unified-to-Specialized Generative Framework (AAAI 2026)
docs.text: 🔗 paper (placeholder) Summary: Combines shared encoder representation with specialized decoders to support multi-view generative retrieval. Tags: multi-view, specialized-decoder, unified-framework

docs.title: 10. Query-Synthesis Corpus Indexing (2024)
docs.text: 🔗 paper Summary: Initializes docIDs using synthetic queries generated from the corpus to improve coverage and alignment. Tags: query-generation, id-initialization
